channel.title: Disable Teleports in certain Area
channel.description:
How would i do this, as its sort of important for my server ^^
any help will do, thanks!
ALSO!
How can i make it so if you die in a certain area you teleport to anthoer area OR how can i make it so you cant die in a certain area (Hp stops at 1)
